## intercept

<a id="intercept"></a>
Intercepts errors, the Go way!

[![][2]][1] [![][3]][1]

### Parameters

- `input` **[Promise][4]**

### Examples

```javascript
import ctch from 'apr-intercept';

const [err1, res1] = await ctch(fn(1));
const [err2, res2] = await ctch(fn(1));
const [, res3] = await ctch(fn(3));
```

Returns **[Promise][4]**
